thread.title: MASTEC INC Files SEC form 8-K, Change in Directors or Principal Officers
thread.title_full: MASTEC INC Files SEC form 8-K, Change in Directors or Principal Officers

title: MASTEC INC Files SEC form 8-K, Change in Directors or Principal Officers
text:
Show all filings for MASTEC INC 
Form 8-K for MASTEC INC 
28-Aug-2015 
Change in Directors or Principal Officers Item 5.02 Departure of Directors or Certain Officers; Election of Directors; Appointment of Certain Officers; Compensatory Arrangements of Certain Officers. 
On August 25, 2015, Daniel A. Restrepo notified MasTec, Inc. ("MasTec") of his decision not to stand for re-election to the Board of Directors (the "Board") at MasTec's 2015 Annual Meeting of Shareholders. Mr. Restrepo will continue to serve as a member of the Board until the 2015 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
